News.headline: Loan Announcement: Jimmy Shepherd Joins Whitehawk FC
News.page_title: Loan Announcement: Jimmy Shepherd Joins Whitehawk FC
News.URL_keywords: Loan Announcement: Jimmy Shepherd Joins Whitehawk FC
News.short_description: Jimmy Shepherd has joined Whitehawk FC on loan until the 7th March 2017
News.description:
The Daggers can announce that defender Jimmy Shepherd has signed a one month loan with National League South club Whitehawk FC until Tuesday 7th March 2017

The defender recently had a one month loan spell at Billericay Town returning to the Daggers at the back end of January.

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on how Shepherd is doing on his loan spell at Whitehawk FC.

Facebook: @OfficialDaggers

Twitter: @Dag_RedFC
